name: ORD_APPROVED_BY
description: This table contains information about the order approval, including approving user, and time at which the order was approved.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: APRV_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who approved an edited result.

columns.name: APRV_BY_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: APRV_BY_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The time stamp of the instant the edited result was approved.

columns.name: APRV_BY_CNCT_DT
columns.description: The contact date that the edited result was approved.
